seller_research:

    "Application Analytics",
    "Digital Adoption Solutions"

buyer_research:

    "Make inspirational quality accessible to others"
  ],
  "use_cases": [

    "Employees",

    "Local communities"

anticipated_qopcs:
{
  "pains": [
    "How can Whatfix help Marks and Spencer achieve its sustainability goals and reduce emissions throughout its value chain?",
    "Will Whatfix be able to integrate with our existing systems and applications?",
    "How can we ensure that Whatfix will provide a good return on investment for our business?",
    "Will Whatfix be able to support our global operations and provide language support for our international customers?",
    "Can Whatfix help us improve our customer experience and provide personalized guidance to our customers?",
    "How can we measure the effectiveness of Whatfix in achieving our business objectives?",
    "Will Whatfix require significant IT resources and support from our side?",
    "Can Whatfix help us reduce training time and costs for our employees?",
    "How can Whatfix help us support our local communities and social responsibility initiatives?",
    "Will Whatfix be able to scale with our growing business needs?"
  ],
  "objections": [
    "Whatfix is too expensive for our budget",
    "We don't see the value of using a digital adoption platform like Whatfix",
    "We already have an in-house solution for employee training and onboarding",
    "We're not sure if Whatfix can integrate with our existing systems and applications",
    "We're concerned about the complexity of implementing and using Whatfix",
    "We don't have the resources to dedicate to implementing and maintaining Whatfix",
    "We're not sure if Whatfix can provide the level of customization we need",
    "We're worried about the security and data privacy of using Whatfix",
    "We're not sure if Whatfix can help us achieve our specific business objectives"
  ]
}
